creator: luci@createc.ro
text:
with --enable-proxy on sun7i target (arm) I get this error and it will loop forewer

[Sat Sep 16 13:52:16.047623 2017] [proxy_hcheck:info] [pid 34359738384:tid 3064544580] (70023)This function has not been implemented on this platform: AH03312: apr_thread_pool_create() with 16 threads failed
[Sat Sep 16 13:52:16.047849 2017] [watchdog:debug] [pid -5264627648507674620:tid 3069363352] mod_watchdog.c(585): AH02981: Watchdog: Created worker thread (_proxy_hcheck_).
[Sat Sep 16 13:52:16.048519 2017] [proxy:debug] [pid -5264506015033851904:tid 3069363352] proxy_util.c(1777): AH00925: initializing worker proxy:reverse shared
[Sat Sep 16 13:52:16.048586 2017] [proxy:debug] [pid -5264506015033851904:tid 3069363352] proxy_util.c(1819): AH00927: initializing worker proxy:reverse local
[Sat Sep 16 13:52:17.043593 2017] [core:notice] [pid -4715750481822642040:tid 3069363352] AH00052: child pid 10645 exit signal Segmentation fault (11)
[Sat Sep 16 13:52:17.044001 2017] [core:notice] [pid -4715750481822642040:tid 3069363352] AH00052: child pid 10646 exit signal Segmentation fault (11)
[Sat Sep 16 13:52:17.044068 2017] [core:notice] [pid -4715750481822642040:tid 3069363352] AH00052: child pid 10647 exit signal Segmentation fault (11)
[Sat Sep 16 13:52:17.044124 2017] [core:notice] [pid -4715750481822642040:tid 3069363352] AH00052: child pid 10648 exit signal Segmentation fault (11)

trying the latest release without proxy-hcheck 2.4.20, maybe something else is the problem ?
